Play.PlayDescription: (6:23) (Shotgun) 1-C.Newton pass short left to 89-S.Smith to NO 48 for 22 yards (42-I.Abdul-Quddus). New Orleans challenged the runner was down by contact ruling, and the play was REVERSED. (Shotgun) 1-C.Newton pass short left to 89-S.Smith to NO 48 for 22 yards (42-I.Abdul-Quddus). FUMBLES (42-I.Abdul-Quddus), RECOVERED by NO-22-T.Porter at NO 31. 22-T.Porter to NO 31 for no gain (89-S.Smith). The pass play was 9 Pass, YAC 13. Smith was hit and fumbled, but originally called down on the field. The play was challenged and reversed. NO#22 T.Porter eventually fell on the ball for the Saints.
